definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: Altruism is another big draw to the company garden.
sentences.chinese: 利他主义是公司菜园的另一大收获。

sentences.english: A horse takes them on errands, and a kitchen garden helps keep them well fed.
sentences.chinese: 马帮他们跑腿，厨房菜园使他们健康而营养充足。

sentences.english: He hedged about his garden with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹子把菜园围起来。

sentences.english: These are the tomatoes from Jen 's garden.
sentences.chinese: 这些番茄来自任氏菜园。

sentences.english: It's easier to drive to the grocery store than to plant my own vegetable garden.
sentences.chinese: 开车去食品店比自己侍弄菜园子容易。

sentences.english: It then runs along channels to different parts of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 水沿着渠道流往菜园的各个部分。

sentences.english: My sister is a vegetable lover, so she plants various vegetables in the garten all around the year.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹喜欢种菜园，一年四季菜园里都有不同的菜。

sentences.english: My sister is a vegetable lover, so she plants various vegetables in the garten all around the year.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹喜欢种菜园，一年四季菜园里都有不同的菜。

sentences.english: Keep a vegetable garden with lots of nice tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 用漂亮的蕃茄来修饰你的蔬菜园。

sentences.english: We grow our own vegetables in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 我们在菜园里自己种菜。

sentences.english: As a result, we have to water the vegetable garden.
sentences.chinese: 所以接下来的一年，她为了她的蔬菜园养了一群鸡。

sentences.english: And my plot, pictured here, is just coming to fruition.
sentences.chinese: 如上图所示，我的小菜园正走向成熟。

sentences.english: They railed in their vegetable garden.
sentences.chinese: 他们用栏杆将他们的菜园围起来。

sentences.english: Neat Vegetable Garden in the City of Nanking, China.
sentences.chinese: 南京城内一处规整的小菜园。

sentences.english: They're chomping at the bit to get their tomatoes in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他们急不可待地想在菜园里采摘西红柿。

sentences.english: She fed her guests on the produce of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 她给客人品尝她菜园子里出产的东西。

definition: private plot allocated to an individual on a collective farm
embankment or foothpath between paddy fields
